name: Downward Dog
desc: A foundational yoga pose that strengthens the entire body and stretches the hamstrings, calves, and back.

name: Tree Pose
desc: A standing balance pose that strengthens the legs and core while improving focus and stability.

name: Warrior I
desc: A powerful standing pose that builds strength and stability in the legs, hips, and shoulders.

name: Warrior II
desc: A grounding pose that opens the hips and shoulders, improving focus and endurance.

name: Child's Pose
desc: A resting pose that stretches the back, hips, and thighs, providing relaxation and grounding.

name: Cobra Pose
desc: A gentle backbend that opens the chest and strengthens the spine, shoulders, and arms.

name: Bridge Pose
desc: A backbend that opens the chest and shoulders, strengthens the glutes, and promotes flexibility in the spine.

name: Triangle Pose
desc: A standing pose that stretches and strengthens the legs, opens the hips, and improves stability.

name: Seated Forward Bend
desc: A seated stretch that lengthens the spine and hamstrings while calming the mind.

name: Mountain Pose
desc: A foundational standing pose that promotes alignment, grounding, and awareness.

name: Chair Pose
desc: A powerful standing pose that strengthens the legs, glutes, and core while building heat in the body.

name: Camel Pose
desc: A deep backbend that opens the chest and shoulders while strengthening the back and promoting flexibility.

name: Boat Pose
desc: A core-strengthening pose that builds stability in the abdominal muscles and balance.

name: Plank Pose
desc: A full-body strength pose that engages the core, arms, and shoulders.

name: Bow Pose
desc: A backbend that stretches the chest and abdomen, strengthens the back, and improves posture.

name: Crow Pose
desc: An arm balance that strengthens the arms, wrists, and core while improving focus.

name: Happy Baby
desc: A gentle hip opener that relaxes the lower back and stretches the inner thighs.

name: Butterfly Pose
desc: A seated pose that stretches the inner thighs, hips, and groin, promoting relaxation.

name: Headstand
desc: An advanced inversion that strengthens the arms, shoulders, and core while increasing blood flow to the brain.

name: Reclined Twist
desc: A gentle twist that releases tension in the spine, stretches the back, and aids digestion.
